description: Update documentation to reflect the new AI Service Interaction Module.

instructions: Based on the design document (`project_dev/in_dev/ai-service-interaction-module/ai_service_interaction_design.md`) and the source code (`src/ai_whisperer/ai_service_interaction.py`), detail the purpose and functionality of the AI Service Interaction Module.
Explain how the module integrates with the existing configuration system (using `config.yaml`) for model selection, API keys, and other relevant settings.
Describe the process of using the module to send prompts to AI services via OpenRouter.
Provide clear instructions and code examples for handling both standard (single response) and streaming (chunked response) interactions.
Add a new section or integrate relevant content into `docs/usage.md` that demonstrates how users can leverage the AI Service Interaction Module within their AIWhisperer workflows.
Include practical examples showing how to configure and use the module for typical AI interaction tasks.
Ensure consistency in formatting and style with existing documentation files in the `docs/` directory.
constraints: Documentation must be clear, concise, and technically accurate.
Examples in `docs/usage.md` must be functional and easy to understand.
Avoid making assumptions about the user's prior knowledge of AI services, focusing on how to use the module within AIWhisperer.
Do not modify any files outside of the `docs/` directory.
validation_criteria: `docs/ai_service_interaction.md` provides a comprehensive overview of the module, including purpose, configuration integration, and usage (standard and streaming).
`docs/usage.md` has been modified and includes examples demonstrating the use of the AI Service Interaction Module.
The documentation accurately reflects the implemented features and integration points of the AI Service Interaction Module as found in the source code.
Documentation follows the general structure and style of other files in the `docs/` directory.
